contents.content: 第四部分 特殊规则
第三节 拓展练习10题
Then there will be a whole range of special attractions all weekend.

contents.title: 这样不仅能节约能源、减少二氧化碳排放，还能提高社区居民生活的质量，关注人而不是汽车。

contents.content: So severe is this problem that we have no alternative but to take some feasible measures to deal with it.
Fascinating as computers utilised in education seem, teachers' roles are more imperative.
Rarely do patients watch a doctor write with a pen that isn't emblazoned with a drug's name, or see a nurse use a tablet not bearing a pharmaceutical company's logo.
Not only is more of the brain involved in play that was suspected, but it also seems to activate higher cognitive processes.
Fun though it is, paramotoring is not in the same league as the acrobatics demonstrated by Yves Rossy.
The use of an architectural style cannot be said to start or finish on a specific date. Neither is it possible to say exactly what characterises a particular movement.
Not until the 1920s when cars and trucks became affordable and roads improved, did migratory beekeeping begin to catch on.
Never before has computing been so versatile.
Not only would this save energy and cut carbon dioxide emissions, it would also enhance the quality of community life, putting the emphasis on people instead of cars.
语法破解：该句为there be结构的完全倒装句，谓语will be放在主语a whole range of special attractions的前面。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。So…that引导的是结果状语从句；主句中So位于句首，修饰形容词severe，句子完全倒装。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。as引导的让步状语从句是部分倒装语序，表语Fascinating提前。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中否定副词Rarely位于句首，句子部分倒装，助动词do放在主语patients之前；that引导的是定语从句，修饰a pen。
语法破解：这是由Not only…but连接的两个句子。but前是一个主从复合句，主句中的Not only位于句首，句子部分倒装，助动词is放在主语more of the brain之前；that引导的是定语从句，修饰play。but后是一个简单句。but前后的句子是同等关系。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。though 引导的让步状语从句是部分倒装语序，表语Fun提前。
语法破解：第一个句子是简单句。第二个句子是主从复合句，主句是完全倒装语序，Neither位于句首，系动词is放在主语it的前面；what引导的是宾语从句，作动词say的宾语。
语法破解：该句以否定副词Not until开头，后面加上由when引导的定语从句，主句要部分倒装，助动词did放在主语migratory beekeeping的前面。
语法破解：这是一个以否动副词Never+before（状语）开头的倒装句，助动词has放在主语computing的前面。
语法破解：这是由Not only…(but) also连接的两个简单句组成的并列句。Not only开头的句子是倒装句，助动词would放在主语this的前面。
